snippet: President Obama is trapped between the need to promote what could be a legacy piece of legislation and the reality that being out front might be counterproductive at best.
abstract: Pres Obama is in difficult position in push for immigration overhaul, trapped between the need to promote what could be a legacy piece of legislation and reality that being out front on issue might be counterproductive at best; opposition to overhaul of immigration system is hardening in Republican-controlled House.
lead_paragraph: President Obama is trapped between the need to promote what could be a legacy piece of legislation and the reality that being out front might be counterproductive at best.

headline.main: Difficult Spot for Obama on Immigration Push
headline.print_headline: Difficult Spot for Obama on Immigration Push
